name: Calliqurata
description:
A humble piece, intended as a proof of concept project for a number of unique mechanics.

Direct glyphs through real-time day and turn-based night puzzles, distributing energy and resources through the network of nodes. For now it has a minimal amount of levels, each asking you to bring at least one Fruit symbol to the @ symbol, by manipulating different sorts of objects with unique properties. 

Controls: Mouse;  

Shortcuts:  Z, X - Undo, Redo for the night time,  Space - advance time. 

All levels are open from the start.
